report.title: Panicky with Weird Feeling
report.author: Reach The Sky
report.bodytext: Ok I about to describe my first and only bad trip. It happened on xmas /n when I got ahold of 2 hits of LSD, I used to tripping alone so I didn't /n care if none of my friends could get out of their home on xmas, I could /n handle this easily....I thought. /n /n At 7:45 pm I decide to swallow the 2 hits, then proceeded to smoke some pot /n and just generally chill out. /n /n T+ 1:30 The trip isn't getting very strong so I decide to smoke some more /n weed, the acid is finally coming up. Some nice red trailers, colors being /n brighter etc. I was thinking this wasn't the best cid I ever had though, no /n real intensity, some slight jolts down the spine. /n /n T+2:15 10 pm, I am high, no doubt, but out of nowhere, I start getting /n sleepy! This was really weird to me, how can you be sleepy on acid, anyway, /n I crushed 3 Ritalins and snorted them, thinking it would just wake me up, /n but that wasn't anything near the truth. /n /n T+ 3:00 Visuals got stronger, I was happy, gigglin alone while watching the simpsons. Looked promising. /n /n T+3:30 My parents get home early from their xmas party! I am very annoyed by this for a few minutes then didn't mind it anymore, I got very paranoid they would notice I was seriously looking higher than anything pot could have done. They went to bed, but that's when the bad trip started. /n /n T+4:00 Visuals getting crazy, at this point, my memories are getting hazy, I remember walking around the house, not quite knowing what to do, sometimes staring blankly, I started feeling weird inside my head an body. /n /n T+7:00 My condition deteriorated, visuals faded away to be replaced by a /n general feeling of sickness and depression, I smoked some more pot, thinking it would alleviate the way I felt, but to no avail, I started feeling panicky, I got scared of my cat for no reason, thinking it looked at me with contempt. The paranoia was getting out of hand, I didn't know for sure if I was breathing correctly, I felt like my heart would stop, I had a very bad pressure below my left foot and inside my right hand. /n /n T+9:00 I had enough, I swallowed 100 mg of trazodone with some cereal and /n went to bed, my pupils got back to normal real quick and I rapidly fell into sleep. /n /n I woke up at 11 am feeling weird still, smoking some pot made the bad /n feeling come back a little, but it went away later in the day. This story /n really confuses me, was it the ritalin ? was it because my parents got home /n earlier than supposed ? was the paranoia caused by the mixture of ritalin /n and lsd? the only other time I was paranoid on acid was my second trip with it, and in no way was it THAT bad. I feel a bit depressed since, and generally tired, seems like this experience really wore me off. Might I recommend not mixing these 2 substances.
